text: Fa'idha Laqitumu Al-Ladhina Kafaru Fađarba Ar-Riqabi Hatta 'Idha 'Athkhantumuhum Fashuddu Al-Wathaqa Fa'imma Mannaan Ba`du Wa 'Imma Fida'an Hatta Tađa`a Al-Harbu 'Awzaraha Dhalika Wa Law Yasha'u Allahu Lantasara Minhum Wa Lakin Liyabluwa Ba`đakum Biba`đin Wa Al-Ladhina Qutilu Fi Sabili Allahi Falan Yuđilla 'A`malahum
